objects.specification: A flat floor panel with a neutral light wood texture covering the entire classroom area, featuring a subtle grain pattern and a matte finish that complements the light wood tones of the student furniture.
Smooth vertical wall painted in a light cream tone with a flat, uniform surface and crisp edges, forming the front boundary of the classroom.
Smooth vertical wall painted in a light cream tone with a flat, uniform surface and crisp edges, forming the back boundary of the classroom.
Smooth vertical wall painted in a light cream tone with a flat, uniform surface and crisp edges, forming the left boundary of the classroom.
Smooth vertical wall painted in a light cream tone with a flat, uniform surface and crisp edges, forming the right boundary of the classroom.
A large rectangular blackboard with a matte dark surface suitable for chalk writing, enclosed by a thin metallic frame with a subtle bevel along the edges.

A rectangular teacher's desk made of darker wood tone with a polished finish; it features a broad flat top, sturdy straight legs, and a modesty panel at the front, with smooth edges and visible wood grain patterns.
A compact ceiling-mounted projector with a white matte casing and streamlined rectangular body, featuring a lens at the front and ventilation slots along the sides.

A tall rectangular bookshelf constructed from light brown wood, featuring five evenly spaced shelves filled with books and educational materials of various sizes and colors, with a sturdy back panel and visible wood grain texture.

A tall rectangular bookshelf constructed from light brown wood, featuring five evenly spaced shelves filled with books and educational materials of various sizes and colors, with a sturdy back panel and visible wood grain texture.
A simple square ceiling light fixture with a white translucent diffuser and a slim profile providing uniform overhead illumination.
A simple square ceiling light fixture with a white translucent diffuser and a slim profile providing uniform overhead illumination.
A simple square ceiling light fixture with a white translucent diffuser and a slim profile providing uniform overhead illumination.
A simple square ceiling light fixture with a white translucent diffuser and a slim profile providing uniform overhead illumination.

A simple square ceiling light fixture with a white translucent diffuser and a slim profile providing uniform overhead illumination.
A large rectangular window with a slim white-painted frame, fitted with translucent curtains that gently diffuse incoming natural light.
Translucent light fabric curtains in a soft neutral tone hanging in gentle folds, slightly pooling at the bottom to filter light subtly.
A round analog wall clock with a white face, black hour markers and simple black hands, enclosed by a thin metallic frame.
An educational poster printed on semi-gloss paper featuring colorful graphics and informative text, mounted with a thin white border.
An educational poster printed on semi-gloss paper featuring colorful graphics and informative text, mounted with a thin white border.

A potted plant with lush green foliage in a simple cylindrical pot; the leaves are broad and glossy, adding a natural accent to the corner near the window.
A flat rectangular rug with a soft woven texture in a muted color palette, featuring a simple border design and low pile to create a cozy area for group activities.
A simple cylindrical waste bin made of durable material with a matte finish, open at the top for easy use.
A simple cylindrical waste bin made of durable material with a matte finish, open at the top for easy use.

A combined student desk and chair unit made of light brown wood with a green padded seat cushion; the desk has a rectangular top with rounded corners and the chair features a contoured backrest supported by four straight legs.
